message: I'll give you $100,000, you can't refuse!
You're not very generous, are you? I'll take this offer, but don't expect me to go easy on you next time!
You think you're tough, huh? I'll give you 400,000, but don't get too comfortable!
You think you're getting the better deal, but I'm just getting started!
You're getting desperate, Bob. Time to make a real offer!
You're not getting any more generous, are you? I'll take the last crumbs, but don't expect me to be grateful!
You're getting greedy, Bob. I'll give you a fair deal, but don't think you're getting away with everything!
